name: portfolio-workspace
description: Portfolio monorepo - runs frontend, backend, and Azure Functions

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:api" --names "FRONTEND,BACKEND,API" --prefix-colors "cyan,green,yellow"
scripts.start:api: cd PortfolioAPI && npm run build && func start
scripts.start:api-only: cd PortfolioAPI && npm run build && func start
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd PortfolioFrontend && npm install && cd ../PortfolioAPI && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:api

author: Rahul A Bangera
